list_translation_mean.translate_mean: sự đi tuần của cảnh sát

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an expedition to keep watch over an area, especially by guards or police walking or driving around at regular intervals.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we were ordered to investigate on a night patrol
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã được lệnh điều tra trong một cuộc tuần tra đêm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a unit of six to eight Girl Scouts or Boy Scouts forming part of a troop.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: break the Cubs into sixes and Scouts into patrols
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: phá vỡ các con thành sáu và trinh sát vào tuần tra

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: keep watch over (an area) by regularly walking or traveling around or through it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the garrison had to patrol the streets to maintain order
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Garrison đã phải tuần tra đường phố để duy trì trật tự
